Package com.itsradiix.discordwebhook.utils

Class NetworkUtils

java.lang.Object
com.itsradiix.discordwebhook.utils.NetworkUtils
public final class NetworkUtils extends Object
Utility Class that entails all needed networking methods. You probably never need to do anything with this except for changing the ScheduledExecutorService.
Since:
2024-05-19

      public static org.apache.hc.client5.http.impl.classic.CloseableHttpResponse postRegularWebHookToAPI(String route, DiscordWebHook discordWebHook)
      The postToAPI method can be used to post data to the API.
      Parameters:
      route - This is the used route to get data from the API.
